body_text: I figured it was a good signal that at least some of the code in this module runs in the content process and is restricted by that. Also I copied the pattern from Pocket, which puts it there too.
body: I figured it was a good signal that at least some of the code in this module runs in the content process and is restricted by that. Also I copied the pattern from Pocket, which puts it there too.
